title: The Great Train Robbery

quote_last: Braque sat in a Pepto-Bismol pink toilet stall in the otherwise empty womenâ€™s bathroom and opened the jar of green sweet pepper jelly. Even with the sound of AC/DC playing and the smell of cheap bleach rising to her face, the scent of the jelly overwhelmed her senses.
title: Kitchens of the Great Midwest
